Equations.Is_Production_Planet: 10 * (Variable_Target.StarbaseLevel > 1) + Variable_Target.StructureCount {Parameter_Type = "E_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "R_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Type = "P_Ground_Barracks", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} + Variable_Target.StructureCount {Parameter_Type = "E_Ground_Heavy_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "R_Ground_Heavy_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "P_Ground_Heavy_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} + Variable_Target.StructureCount {Parameter_Type = "E_Ground_Advanced_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Type = "P_Ground_Advanced_Vehicle_Factory", Parameter_Only_Consider_Complete = 1.0} + clamp(Function_Defense_Level.Evaluate, 0.0, 2.0)
Equations.Weeks_Since_Control_Gained: ((Variable_Target.TimeSinceConversion / 40.0) * Variable_Target.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Empire"} * Variable_Self.IsFaction {Parameter_Faction = "Empire"}) + ((Variable_Target.TimeSinceConversion / 40.0) * Variable_Target.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Rebel"} * Variable_Self.IsFaction {Parameter_Faction = "Rebel"}) + ((Variable_Target.TimeSinceConversion / 40.0) * Variable_Target.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Underworld"} * Variable_Self.IsFaction {Parameter_Faction = "Underworld"}) + ((Variable_Target.TimeSinceConversion / 40.0) * Variable_Target.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Pirates"} * Variable_Self.IsFaction {Parameter_Faction = "Pirates"}) + ((Variable_Target.TimeSinceConversion / 40.0) * Variable_Target.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Hutts"} * Variable_Self.IsFaction {Parameter_Faction = "Hutts"}) + ((Variable_Target.TimeSinceConversion / 40.0) * Variable_Target.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Pentastar"} * Variable_Self.IsFaction {Parameter_Faction = "Pentastar"}) + ((Variable_Target.TimeSinceConversion / 40.0) * Variable_Target.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Teradoc"} * Variable_Self.IsFaction {Parameter_Faction = "Teradoc"}) + ((Variable_Target.TimeSinceConversion / 40.0) * Variable_Target.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Hutt_Cartels"} * Variable_Self.IsFaction {Parameter_Faction = "Hutt_Cartels"}) + ((Variable_Target.TimeSinceConversion / 40.0) * Variable_Target.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "SsiRuuvi_Imperium"} * Variable_Self.IsFaction {Parameter_Faction = "SsiRuuvi_Imperium"}) + ((Variable_Target.TimeSinceConversion / 40.0) * Variable_Target.IsFaction{Parameter_Faction = "Corporate_Sector"} * Variable_Self.IsFaction {Parameter_Faction = "Corporate_Sector"})
